note.p: Daughter of John and Anne Whitehurst of Shrewsbury. Married George Baskerville Watton (1826/7–69) of Dorrington Grove near Shrewsbury in 1866. Rented the Mount, Shrewsbury, 1866–7. Listed as a widow, living at Mount House in Shrewsbury with her brother, 1871. With her niece Ada Mary Louise (or Louisa) Pethick née Whitehurst, 22, in Hampstead, Middlesex, 1891.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/2777/21/36), 1881 (RG11/2652/100/3), 1891 (RG12/115/56/14) 1901 (RG13/2537/135/24)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 10 September 2019)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 10 September 2019)
Correspondence vol. 15, letter from Salt & Sons, 17 July 1867
